£28.00

name: Multi Sizer - Ring Sizing Gauge
description:
To check the ring size you require simply pop the multi sizer onto your finger and adjust to ensure a comfortable fit. Make sure that the sizer fits back over your knuckle but wont fall off if you shake your hand.
When you are happy with the fit, read off the size indicated by the arrow.
£2.00
